diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Post-ERCP Pancreatitis, Biliary obstruction, Jaundice, CBD and Pancreatic duct dilation, Pancreatic adenocarcinoma
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with right upper quadrant and epigastric pain, CBD dilation noted on imaging, and elevated liver function tests, leading to consultation for ERCP. The findings suggest post-ERCP pancreatitis in the context of possible pancreatic adenocarcinoma given the pancreatic duct dilation and adjacent calcifications.
